channel.title: Pages on ewen
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on ewen

item.title: Projects
item.description: Software fplR: R package for working with Fantasy Premier League (FPL) data geniusr: R package for interacting nicely with the Genius API ghibli: Studio Ghibli colour palettes for R Web Applications polMonitor: Shiny app for monitoring police violence Vinylspotting: Shiny app for Discogs users to visualise and explore their record collections

Ewen (like you ‘n’). Interested in the fields of data science, technology, music, sound art, sport, culture, policy, and especially where any of these intersect. I like spending time with humane/ethical open source projects, DJing, running, supporting local artistic communities and sinking into a Discogs rabbit-hole. This site is mostly for sharing stories about my diverse excursions in these spaces.
